description: Registry of all GAIA-native MCP servers. Each entry defines a module that can be exposed to Claude Code as a set of callable tools via the Model Context Protocol.

servers.name: gaia-warden
servers.description: Governance & Compliance -- secrets scanning, env validation, project compliance checks.

servers.name: gaia-argus
servers.description: Monitoring & Telemetry -- event querying, health checks, ecosystem status.

servers.name: gaia-mnemis
servers.description: Cross-Project Memory -- store, retrieve, and search memories with provenance tracking.

servers.name: gaia-mycel
servers.description: Shared Intelligence Library -- embedding, querying, chunking.

servers.name: gaia-loom
servers.description: Visual Agent Editor -- workflow listing and execution.

servers.name: gaia-raven
servers.description: Autonomous Research Agent -- ad-hoc investigations and summarization.
